content: the sky s the limit with these customizable fingerless gloves they re comfortable easy quick to knit up and just about any stitch pattern can be added to the back worked in the round with an even number of stitches all you would need to do is calculate the number of stitches you need for a stitch pattern and how big you want the design for the back to be go crazy with it quick note if you choose to knit this on us size 2 9 circular needles the stitches are small enough to make this almost like a compression glove or a size smaller if you or your recipient have small arms us size 2 should be fine but whip up a quick swatch to test the fit - 03 apr 2016
